titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Charles Kendrick papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Loralee Sepsey

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-11-18T08:09-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Speeches, correspondence, diaries, minutes, reports, memoranda, maps, orders, photographs, and memorabilia, relating to American military activities in France during World War I, Herbert Hoover, national business associations in the United States, and San Francisco civic affairs.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Charles Kendrick papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1983.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Served as a trustee of the San Francisco War Memorial
Served as a member of the Advisory Committee for the San Francisco Water System
Served as a member of the San Francisco Planning Commission
Served as a member of the San Francisco Relief Committee
Served as Vice President of the Golden Gate International Exposition
Served as President of the Board of Trustees for Mills College
Served as President of the Pan America Union
Worked for the Schlage Lock Company, from temporary management to President to Chairman of the Board

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Speeches, correspondence, reports, diaries, minutes, photographs, memoranda, newspaper articles, pamphlets, printed media, and other documents relating to the activities of the Bohemian Club, the Pan American Union, San Francisco civic affairs such as the San Francisco War Memorial and the Golden Gate International Exposition, World War I, and various national business associations. Also includes information on the establishment of the Hoover Institution and correspondence with Herbert Hoover, Richard Nixon, and Calvin Coolidge.

controlaccess.corpname: United States. Army. American Expeditionary Forces.
controlaccess.subject: World War, 1914-1918--Campaigns--France.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Photographs, programs, invitations, and other documents relating to the affairs of Charles Kendrick.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: General letters, telegrams, and other forms of correspondence to, from, and concerning Charles Kendrick and his affairs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: General correspondence, organized alphabetically by last name.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Speeches, essays, notes, poems, and other writings authored by Charles Kendrick or used in his writings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets, invitations, booklets, newspaper articles, photographs, poems, magazines, and other various miscellany deemed by Charles Kendrick to be "worth saving."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Diaries, transcripts, and other documents that deal with Charles Kendrick's various trips, from serving in World War I to exploring Africa, South America, and various parts of Europe.

did.unittitle: Travel Diary of the World Tour,
"Changing China" and "The Memoirs of Charles Kendrick,"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, newspaper articles, and various other documents and forms of media that deal with Charles Kendrick's involvement with numerous professional and community organizations, most notably: the National Association of Manufacturers, the Hoover Institution, the San Francisco War Memorial, the Golden Gate International Exposition, and the National Industrial Conference Board.

did.unittitle: Alphabetical List of Members of Exposition Committees binder,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A binder of contact information for people involved in Exposition Committees (most likely the Golden Gate International Exposition).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Letters, telegrams, and other forms of correspondence relating to the establishment of the Hoover Institution, and various activities surrounding it between the years 1938-1960. Includes personal correspondence between Herbert Hoover and Charles Kendrick.
